#### Thank you for using Text Transformer! âœ¨
This workflow has been created using Fast Alfred, a user-friendly workflow builder that simplifies the process of creating Alfred workflows.
## Features
- Grammar: Correct grammar mistakes - Beautify: Enhance the text for better readability and engagement - Spell Check: Identify spelling errors without grammar checking - Translate: Translate text into any language - Tones: Change the tone of the text be giving input - Summarize: Summarize the text to be more concise - Explain: Explain the text in a more understandable way - Commit Styling: Format commit messages to be more readable - Table: Transform text into well-formatted markdown tables
#### Use Active App Context Enable the `Use Application Context` option to utilize the current app context for your workflow. This feature enhances text styling and formatting, customizing them to meet your specific needs.
## Usage
Use your customized Alfred keyword to activate each command.
### API key
You can generate an OpenAI key via the following link:
https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/api-keys
### Translate
Enter the language code (e.g., "en" for English) followed by the text to be translated, like "en Hello, how are you?"
If the language code is missing, the default language will be English.
To view the workflow codebase, click here: https://github.com/Avivbens/alfredo
Your selection for LLM provider - including Anthropic, Google, OpenAI
In order to avoid unnecessary calls to the LLM model, we would debounce each request until the user stopped typing âœ¨
Set all languages you want easy access to. Use comma to separate them.
Get an instant 2 lines TL;DR of any content
Extract relevant pinpoint items from a large text
Create a table out of any data input
Whether to use the current application context for better text formatting
